title: Natural Juice - Cherry Flavored
desc: Cherry, a sweet, red fruit with a tangy taste that's perfect for any time of the day. We hand-picked the cherries that go into this juice and they are sweet, tart, and delicious. Cherry juice is a great way to get your daily dose of antioxidants and is a source of Vitamin C.

title: Natural Juice - Banana Flavored
desc: Banana Flavored is a product that comes in a can that has a fruit-like design on the side of the can. It is a juice that has been created by squeezing the fruit and filtering it through a strainer. The juice is then blended with various ingredients to give it a unique taste.

title: Natural Juice - Apple Flavored
desc: At the height of a bright, cool fall day, I pulled open the doors to a new cafe, anticipating the first crisp bite of my apple-flavored smoothie. With the crisp air and the taste of cinnamon on my tongue, I knew I had found the perfect place to kick back and relax with my new friend.

title: Natural Juice - Kiwi Flavored
desc: You're on a kiwi fruit kick, and we can help you out with our natural juice! Kiwi fruit is tart, with a flavor that is bursting with summertime. It is loaded with vitamins and minerals, and provides the body with plenty of potassium and vitamin C. This delicious juice will provide your body with just what it needs to stay healthy and hydrated.

title: Natural Juice - Orange Flavored
desc: Orange Juice has been a popular beverage for years. It is a refreshing drink that is easy to drink. Now you can have your favorite citrus juice in a convenient, easy to take with you on the go drink. This orange juice is made with 100% pure juice.

title: Natural Juice - Strawberry Flavored
desc: Strawberry Juice is a popular and refreshing drink, typically served chilled. It is a delicious, red fruit juice that is often combined with ice cubes or served on the rocks.

title: Natural Juice - Watermelon Flavored
desc: Watermelon juice is a refreshing summertime drink that is a refreshing alternative to water. The juice is made from watermelon rind and water. This drink can be enjoyed in many ways, but the most common way is to pour the juice over ice and enjoy it as a drink.

title: Fizzy Natural Juice - Cherry Flavored
desc: This recipe is easy to make and has a great taste. All you need is a blender, a pitcher, a few cups of water, and the juice of two small watermelons. You can make this in a matter of minutes and it is perfect for your summertime parties.

title: Fizzy Natural Juice - Banana Flavored
desc: Banana fizzy juice is a juice that is sold by a juice company. The product is a non-carbonated fruit juice drink with no added sugar and a mild banana flavor. The juice can be found in a variety of flavors and is sold in plastic bottles.

title: Fizzy Natural Juice - Apple Flavored
desc: Apple Fizzy Juice is a new juice line from Coca-Cola. The apple fizzy juice has the perfect balance of tart and sweet flavors. The juice has no added sugar, so it is a healthy choice for anyone who is watching their sugar intake. The apple fizzy juice is a new, exciting flavor that will be enjoyed by all.

title: Fizzy Natural Juice - Kiwi Flavored
desc: Kiwi Fizzy Juice is a naturally delicious fruit drink with no added sugar. It's made with a hint of lemon and a splash of lime and has a refreshing, crisp taste.

title: Fizzy Natural Juice - Orange Flavored
desc: Orange Fizzy Juice is a bright and bubbly orange juice drink with a mild, fruity taste. It is sweetened with real orange juice and can be enjoyed chilled or hot.

title: Fizzy Natural Juice - Strawberry Flavored
desc: Strawberry Fizzy Juice is the perfect drink for anyone looking for a refreshing and fruity beverage. This refreshing drink is made with 100% pure fruit juice, so you know it is a healthy option. The juice is frozen for a long lasting taste, and the taste of the juice can be enhanced by adding your favorite flavors.

title: Fizzy Natural Juice - Watermelon Flavored
desc: Our 100% pure, non-alcoholic, natural watermelon juice is made fresh daily with no added preservatives. With a refreshingly sweet taste, you will love this juice as much as your kids will.

title: Canned Lemonade
desc: Canned lemonade juice is a beverage that is refreshing and tastes great. It is a drink that is popular during the summer months. It is also a drink that is offered in various stores.

title: Canned Orangeade
desc: In a can, orange juice is one of the most popular beverages in the Serbia. Orange juice is rich in vitamin C and a source of folate. It also has natural sugars that are low in calories. It's popular for breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

title: Fruit Splash Can
desc: When it comes to juice, this is the one to buy. With fresh ingredients like oranges and lemons, it's a great way to stay hydrated and keep your immune system healthy.

title: Brain.storm(); Energy
desc: The energy drink is a caffeinated beverage that provides a temporary boost of energy. It contains caffeine, fresh fruits and vitamins. It's pleasant flavor makes it a favorite among not only programmers and gamers but also athletes. It contains a wide variety of fruits, including pears, lemons, apples, and oranges.

title: Triple Pack - Starter Pack
desc: The juicers offered at Earth Fare are of the best quality, offering juice that is easy to drink, is low in calories, and is not made with added sugars. The starter pack comes with a juicer and three types of juices: lemon, orangeade, and fruit splash.
